name: DefectList Report
query:
select DF.defect_list_from as `Generated From::100`,
CASE
    WHEN IT.type='Functional' THEN IT.item_name
    WHEN IT.type='Sub functional' THEN (select parent_item from `tabItem` where item_code=IT.item_code)
    WHEN IT.type='Equipment' THEN (select parent_item from `tabItem` where item_code=(select parent_item from `tabItem` where item_code=IT.item_code))
    ELSE (select parent_item from `tabItem` where item_code=(select parent_item from `tabItem` where item_code=(select parent_item from `tabItem` where item_code=IT.item_code)))
END
as `Function::100`,
CASE
    WHEN IT.type='Functional' THEN IT.item_name
    WHEN IT.type='Sub functional' THEN  IT.item_name
    WHEN IT.type='Equipment' THEN (select parent_item from `tabItem` where item_code=IT.item_code)
    ELSE  (select parent_item from `tabItem` where item_code=(select parent_item from `tabItem` where item_code=IT.item_code)) 
END
as Category,
IT.item_name as Item,
DF.description as `Defect Description`,
DF.risk_level as `Risk Level`,
DF.repair_status as `Status`,
DF.failure_date as `Entry Date`,
DF.target_date as `Target Date`,
DF.completion_date as `Completion Date`,
CASE
    WHEN DF.shore_assistance_required=0 THEN "No"
    WHEN DF.shore_assistance_required=1 THEN "Yes"
    ELSE "No" 
END
as `Shore required`,
DF.spares_required_reference as `Spares/ stores required reference`

from `tabAsset Repair` DF
inner join `tabItem` IT
on DF.item_code=IT.item_code
